ingameusername (all lowercase!).pingNotifications: true/false (do you want to be pinged on name mention?)
ingameusername (all lowercase!).altPingNotifications: true/false (do you want to be pinged whenever alt account is mentioned?)
ingameusername (all lowercase!).groupPingNotifications: true/false (do you want to be pinged whenever cydonia is mentioned?)
ingameusername (all lowercase!).miscPings: true/false (do you want to be pinged for miscelanious pings?)
ingameusername (all lowercase!).serverPings: true/false (do you want to be pinged in the discord server for the above?)
ingameusername (all lowercase!).DMPings: false/true (or would you rather the bot DM you?)
